answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The first possibility that should be investigated is hyperthyroidism. The next thing is something like Sjogren’s syndrome where there is decreased sweating. If both these conditions are ruled out then diabetes and electrolyte imbalance should be looked at.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
